amendment.description: Amendment adds a new section and authorizes funding for small business development centers to assist small manufacturers that are transitioning into growth sectors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 111-121 to create a new section and authorize funding for small business development centers to assist small manufacturers that are transitioning into growth sectors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schauer amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
